form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to expand the role of the Chief of the National Guard Bureau in the assignment of Directors and Deputy Directors of the Army National Guard and Air National Guard.

section.header: Role of the Chief of the National Guard Bureau in assignment of Directors and Deputy Directors of the Army National Guard and Air National Guard

subsection.text: Section 10506(a) of title 10, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking selected by the Secretary of the Army and inserting recommended by the Chief of the National Guard Bureau, from not less than three candidates identified by the Secretary of the Army,; and

in subparagraph (B), by striking selected by the Secretary of the Air Force and inserting recommended by the Chief of the National Guard Bureau, from not less than three candidates identified by the Secretary of the Air Force,; and

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking The officers so selected and inserting The Director and Deputy Director, Army National Guard, and the Director and Deputy Director, Air National Guard,.

subsection.text: Paragraph (3) of such section is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking The President and inserting Consistent with paragraph (1), the President;
by redesignating subparagraphs (C) and (E) as subparagraphs (B) and (C), respectively.
